entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog at times late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Saturday 29 April 2023
